byline.original: By JACK EWING and DAVID JOLLY
byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo and Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting.

abstract: Signals that European debt crisis is far from over deflate market rally that had followed a show of resolve by European leaders; investors remain wary of Italy as its borrowing costs rise.
snippet: Markets took heed as Italy’s borrowing costs rose and an Austrian bank posted a big loss.
lead_paragraph: Markets took heed as Italy’s borrowing costs rose and an Austrian bank posted a big loss.

headline.main: Hitches Signal Further Difficulties for Euro Zone
headline.print_headline: Hitches Signal Further Difficulties for Euro Zone
headline.seo: Hitches Signal Difficulties for the Euro Zone
